summary: Use the power of the Dark Side of the force to banish your enemies!
descriptionHtml:
This is a mod that adds a spell to the game called: UnlimitedPower.
The emperor (in Revenge of The Sith) shouted UNLIMITED POWER, when he shocked Mace Windu!

This spell does NOT have a spell tome, you must add it through Console.
Follow these steps:

Press ~ to open up console
Type: help unlimitedpower 0
The console will then show you a number like this: 1c000d63 
Type: player.addspell 1c000d63 
Press Tab, then go to Magic/Destruction and find UnlimitedPower
Press \"E\" to equip it and HAVE FUN!
author: Xtrendence
